headlines: Donald Trump, Elon Musk discuss AI, cybersecurity with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella
author: N/A
fullNews: Silicon Valley has sought to warm relations with Trump following his victory last November, despite frequent clashes during his first term. Many have traveled to Trump’s Mar-a-Lago estate in Florida, where the president-elect and Musk have held a series of private meetings and dinners to discuss plans for the coming term. Semafor first reported Nadella’s dinner with Trump.

author: N/A
